attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned request that the prime minister reveal in full the current cost to the british taxpayer  of benefits to immigrants from non commonwealth or european union countries
attributes.creator_name: Mr Michael Bruce McIntyre BEM. LCG

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
